sub_title: Senior Reservoir Engineer at Dana petroleum plc
summary:
Specialties: Reservoir Simulation and new target identification in platform and subsea oil and gas field developments, particularly in the North Sea.

Strong interpersonal skills - liaising with colleagues in many different departments, co-venturers, management and relevant government organisations.

Strong technical skills developed through a culture of technical excellence throughout my career.
